modName: Quest - Titus Mede II Mysterious Treasure is currently under Maintenance
summary:
That Mod is Currently under Maintenance for Reworking.
Sword of the Septim gets named Sword of Titus Mede II 
so keep updated!
descriptionHtml:
This Modification gets overhauled in many Ways!

1. Sword of the Septim gets Renamed into Sword of Titus Mede II
2. Quests gonna begin in Whiterun
3. New Companion (maybe)
4. Somewhere you can Find the Original Sword of the Septim (overpowerd.... becareful its disappearing by removing!)
5. I try to Construct an own custom Dungeon for Quests
6. After you complet the Custom dongeon your Campaign begins @Dark Brotherhood...
7. Spoiler; You have to Kill Titus Mede II if you kill him on your quest on dark brotherhood then you find in his carpin a noble treasure which contains......

Heavy Armor of Titus Mede II
Heavy Gauntlets of Titus Mede II
Heavy Boots of Titus Mede II
Heavy Helmet of Titus Mede II
Holy Thunder Sword of Titus Mede II

That set give your incredible stats...

\"Are you proud to killed the Emperor Titus Mede II?\"

Well for that quest you should have do the dark brotherhood questline, because my quest is like you search for his equipment because you heard from somewhere its extrem worth it!
author: bardockssj
